title: MBallSectionsDR
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: Smithsonian to shutter Sunday as government shutdown continues
items.description: The Smithsonian Institution will close its doors Sunday as the government shutdown heads into its third week.

items.title: Spanberger Won’t Condemn School Board Member For Sympathetic Emails To Sex Offender Using Girls’ Bathroom
items.description: A Spanberger spokeswoman refused to address the then-candidate's exchange of sympathetic emails with sex offender Richard Kenneth Cox.

items.title: A Deep Dive in All Things LBJ
items.description: His exemplary presidential museum in Austin explores the times that still haunt us.

items.title: The Only Defensible Obamacare Deal
items.description: Employers and individuals alike must be free to choose better, more affordable health insurance.

items.title: Trump says troops will be paid despite shutdown
items.description: President Trump has directed the use of "all available funds" to pay military members while the government is closed.

items.title: This Leftist Hot Spot Could Be a Haven for Genuine Political Diversity
items.description: Many conservatives understandably associate UC Berkeley with leftist activism. But it has been surprisingly open to differing opinions.

items.title: Why Aren’t Students Reading Books?
items.description: Classroom curricula see literature as a means rather than as an end in itself.

items.title: Biden to receive radiation and hormone therapy as next steps in prostate cancer treatment
items.description: Former President Biden is receiving radiation and hormone therapy as a new phase of treatment for his aggressive form of prostate cancer.

items.title: National Guard troops sent to Illinois by Trump can stay but can't be deployed for now, says court

items.title: The Utterly Unsurprising ‘Revelation’ That the FBI Perused Senators’ Phone Records

items.title: Margaret Thatcher Docudrama Shows What Media Corruption Stole From Us
items.description: Brian and Maggie shows how a good interviewer can still reveal much about a subject that the subject does not necessarily want to reveal.

items.title: Trump Snub Proves The Nobel Peace Prize Is A Joke

items.title: Democrats Are Giving Up On Democracy
items.description: It doesn’t matter how unpopular Democrats’ policies are, they are not going to negotiate, they are not going to compromise.

items.title: Katie Porter’s Nasty, Abusive Attitude Is Standard, Antisocial Democrat Behavior
items.description: You simply do not hear stories about berated staff from Republicans in Congress or the West Wing. Antisocial behavior is a Democrat thing.
